definitions.title: Qal.
definitions.body: Inf. cstr. [[רָפָה הַיּוֹם לַעֲרוֹב]] Ju Jdg 19:9, but rd. prob. [[נׇטָה הַיּוֹם לַעֶרֶב]] LXXL GFM; Pf. 3 fs. fig. [[עָֽרְבָה]] Is 24:11 all joy has grown dark, but rd. [[עָֽבְרָה]] has passed away Lo Gr Perles:Anal. 91 Che:Hpt al.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Inf. abs. [[הַשְׁכֵּם]] [[וְהַעֲרֵב]] 1Sa 17:16 doing it at morning and at evening.
